org.trianacode.taskgraph.service

Interface IOCable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cable, InputCable, OutputCable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataCable, LocalCable, QueueCable, RunnableCable

    public interface IOCable
extends InputCable, OutputCable
    A IOCable is an interface which Cables can implement to send and recieve data between the tasks that this cable connects. This can be done locally by using a LocalCable (extends GAPCable) or remotely by using RemoteCable (also extends GAPCable)
    See Also:
    LocalCable

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.trianacode.taskgraph.Cable

        CONTROL_CABLE_TYPE

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.InputCable

        flush, isDataReady, recv, resume, suspend

      • Methods inherited from interface org.trianacode.taskgraph.service.OutputCable

        flush, isDataSent, resume, send, sendNonBlocking, suspend

      • Methods inherited from interface org.trianacode.taskgraph.Cable

        addCableListener, connect, connects, contains, disconnect, getReceivingNode, getReceivingTask, getSendingNode, getSendingTask, getType, isConnected, reconnect, removeCableListener
